tag_list: syncapps, cazoomi, integration, netsuite, salesforce, implementation, oracle, constant-contact, email-marketing, hootsuite
overview:
Clint Wilson started Cazoomi.com as CxO and Community Ambassador in 2009. Clint holds an aggressively diverse background of more than 20 years experience from start-ups to Fortune 500 companies.

Before Clint started Cazoomi.com, he was sought out by top SaaS firms to drive both small and large scale SaaS sales, implementation, integration and support projects.

As CxO, at Cazoomi.com, a niche player and leader in the emerging eBusiness Social SaaS MarketPlace space, Clint was responsible for all strategic and operational functions of the company.

Under his leadership Cazoomi.com grew in excess of 100% month over month during their private beta in 2010, garnered over 1500 members on the platform, launched the company’s international operations with operating subsidiaries in Philippines, India, Indonesia and Canada.

Before Cazoomi.com, Clint was Integrations and Support Lead at Sererra Consulting where he worked with a team leading multiple successful SaaS implementations leading to Sererra obtaining top NetSuite VAR status in 2009.

In broader circles, Clint is well known as an ultra-marathoner, avid cyclist and 4 continent solo-mountain biking finalist.

Specialties:

Systems Implementation, Integration, Requirements Gathering, Boomi, SnapLogic, Cast Iron, Pervasive, Salesforce, NetSuite, Zoho, Revenue Forecasting, G/L Reconciliation, Financial Reporting, Revenue Recognition, FP&A, ERP, Social CRM, CRM
